ceci-audio/description: Plays an audio clip using a URL or data-uri as input.
ceci-audio/attributes/source/description: The URL for the sound clip you want to play.
ceci-audio/attributes/volume/description: How loud do you want it to be?
ceci-audio/attributes/loop/description: Loop the audio clip when it finishes.
ceci-audio/attributes/speed/description: 1 for normal speed, 2 for double speed.
